CloseLeftSidePanel.Title: Display Root List
CloseLeftSidePanel.ShortHelp: Hides or shows the list of root objects in the left navigation pane.
CloseLeftSidePanel.LongHelp:
To remove a root, click the close icon.

To cross-highlight, select the root in the side panel. The same root is selected in the 3D.
CloseRightSidePanel.Title: Information
CloseRightSidePanel.ShortHelp: Displays information about the selected object in different tabs in a side pane.
CloseRightSidePanel.LongHelp: The available tabs depend on the app they are launched from, and the type of object that is selected.
ENO3DCleanViewCmd.Title: Close
ENO3DCleanViewCmd.ShortHelp: Close all the objects from the view.
ENO3DDefineFilterCmd.Title: Filter
ENO3DDefineFilterCmd.ShortHelp: Filters the structure either by attribute or by configuration.
ENO3DDefineFilterCmd.LongHelp: Opens the filter pane where you can define the criteria to filter the structure either by attribute or by configuration.
ENO3DFocusOnCmd.Title: Focus On
ENO3DHideShowCmd.Title: Hide/Show
ENO3DPrintCmd.Title: Print Screenshot
ENO3DPrintCmd.ShortHelp: Prints the content of the viewer, including selection highlight and loading boxes, to the printer of your choice.
ENO3DReframeOnCmd.Title: Reframe On
ENO3DTransparencyCmd.Title: Transparency
ENO3DStatusBarCloseAction.Title: Status Bar
ENO3DStatusBarOpenAction.Title: Status Bar
ENO3DViewerCopyScreenshotCmd.Title: Copy Screenshot
ENO3DViewerCopyScreenshotCmd.ShortHelp: Takes a screenshot of the 3D viewer, and copy it to your clipboard.
ENO3DViewerCopyScreenshotCmd.LongHelp: The screenshot only includes the content of the 3D viewer, the panels (such as the layer panel or side panel), and the action bar are not captured.
ENO3DViewerScreenshotCmd.Title: Save Screenshot
ENO3DViewerScreenshotCmd.ShortHelp: Takes a screenshot of the 3D viewer, and saves it as a .png file.
ENO3DViewerScreenshotCmd.LongHelp: The screenshot only includes the content of the 3D viewer, the panels (such as the layer panel or side panel), and the action bar are not captured.
ENO3DRelationalNavigatorCmd.Title: Relations
ENO3DRelationalNavigatorCmd.ShortHelp: Opens the Relations widget and displays the ecosystem of related objects.
ENO3DRevealDocumentsCmd.Title: Reveal Documents
ENO3DRevealDocumentsCmd.ShortHelp: Displays the attachments and specification documents attached to the objects in the 3D view.
ENO3DVolumeQueryCmd.Title: Volume Query
ENO3DVolumeQueryCmd.ShortHelp: Filters objects in a validated volume (box, sphere, proximity).
HighQualityCmd.Title: High
OpenLandingPageCmd.Title: Home
OpenLeftSidePanel.Title: Display Root List
OpenLeftSidePanel.ShortHelp: Hides or shows the list of root objects in the left navigation pane.
OpenLeftSidePanel.LongHelp:
To remove a root, click the close icon.

To cross-highlight, select the root in the side panel. The same root is selected in the 3D.
OpenRightSidePanel.Title: Information
OpenRightSidePanel.ShortHelp: Displays information about the selected object in different tabs in a side pane.
OpenRightSidePanel.LongHelp: The available tabs depend on the app they are launched from, and the type of object that is selected.
OpenWithCatiaAction.Title: CATIA V5
OpenWithFinderAction.Title: Product Finder
OpenWithMarkupAction.Title: 3D Markup
OptimizedQualityCmd.Title: Optimized
ENO3DShowTimelineView.Title: Show/Hide Timeline View
ENO3DShowTimelineView.ShortHelp: Displays or hides the timeline in the view.
ENO3DHideTimelineView.Title: Show/Hide Timeline View
ENO3DHideTimelineView.ShortHelp: Displays or hides the timeline in the view.
ENO3DPointCloudClassificationCmd.Title: Colorize according to LAS classification
ENO3DPointCloudClassificationCmd.ShortHe: Lets you colorize the point cloud according to the LAS classification of the data, such as vegetation, buildings, or water bodies.
ENO3DPointCloudClassificationCmd.LongHel: The data is colorized with the default class colors. You can change theses colors and hide the classes.
ENO3DPointCloudElevationCmd.Title: Colorize according to coordinates
ENO3DPointCloudElevationCmd.ShortHelp: Lets you colorize the point cloud with a gradient along the chosen axis.
ENO3DPointCloudElevationCmd.LongHelp:
By default, the data is colorized along the Z axis with the default gradient color. You can change the following elements:
  • The axis
  • The color of the gradient
  • The boundaries of the gradient
  • The weight of the minimum and maximum color
ENO3DShowPointCloudMinimap.Title: Show/Hide Minimap
ENO3DShowPointCloudMinimap.ShortHelp: Displays or hides the Minimap panel.
ENO3DShowPointCloudMinimap.LongHelp: The map inside the Minimap panel shows the location state environment to help you locate yourself.
ENO3DHidePointCloudMinimap.Title: Show/Hide Minimap
ENO3DHidePointCloudMinimap.ShortHelp: Displays or hides the Minimap panel.
ENO3DHidePointCloudMinimap.LongHelp: The map inside the Minimap panel shows the location state environment to help you locate yourself.
ENO3DPhoto360ModeOFF.Title: Toggle Photo 360 Mode
ENO3DPhoto360ModeOFF.ShortHelp: Activates or deactivates the Photo 360 mode.
ENO3DPhoto360ModeON.Title: Toggle Photo 360 Mode
ENO3DPhoto360ModeON.ShortHelp: Activates or deactivates the Photo 360 mode.
